Name: natural gas, high pressure, domestic supply with seasonal storage | natural gas, high pressure | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/352:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains/3520:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains
Description: An average leakage rate of 0.1% of the gas stored was used by Bussa et al. (2023), based on previous studies. Furthermore, Bussa et al. assumed that 15% of total natural gas supply is temporarily stored, based on European Commission (2015), for all geographies covered.
